DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate short term effect Maitland comparison Mulligan mobilization sub-acute chronic non specific neck pain improve neck pain , pain pressure threshold , rang motion , joint position sense , disability , evaluate interaction psychological factor . Study design : experimental study
DOC.brief_title: Maitland Mobilization Versus Mulligan Mobilization Sub-Acute Chronic Non-Specific Neck Pain
DOC.detailed_description: 44 patient sub-acute chronic neck pain randomize Maitland group : 22 patient receive central postro anterior unilateral postero anterior . Mulligan group : 22 patient receive sustain natural apophyseal glide . The treatment 2 time /week three week . Measurement take pre intervention three week neck pain , pain pressure threshold , range motion , joint position sense , disability use numeric pain rating scale , pain pressure threshold test , cervical range motion device , neck disability index , depression , anxiety , fear avoidance believe pain catestrophizing respectively .
DOC.criteria: • Patients age 20 50 year . Neck pain one week without radicular symptom . Pain posterior neck superior nuchal line first thoracic vertebra . • Patient contraindicate mobilization ( pregnancy , whiplash injury , tumor , fracture , metabolic disease , rheumatoid arthritis , osteoporosis rest blood pressure high 140/90 mmHg ) . Cervical radiculopathy . Fibromyalgia pain syndrome . Previous neck surgery . Neck pain associate vertigo cause vertebrobasilar insufficiency chronic headache . Patient receive physical therapy treatment previous three month . Psychiatric disorder . Vestibular system deficit .
